Player History
Had first career hit on 3/31/2013, off Justin Verlander (DET)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/17/2013, off Nick Maronde (LAA)...
1/30/2014: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,000,000 through salary arbitration...
1/30/2015: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,000,000 through salary arbitration...
Drove in 7 runs against Minnesota on 4/24/2015...
Traded from Tampa Bay to Philadelphia on 6/9/2015 (Going to TB: 3B Jon Gilmore, P Jean Mijares. Going to PHI: SS Sean Rodriguez)...
1/30/2016: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,017,143 through salary arbitration...
Signed as a free agent by Texas on 2/11/2017 to a 3-year deal worth $5,000,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/22/2018, hitting .476 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/5/2018, hitting .429 with 2 HR, 9 RBI...
Injured on 8/31/2019 with a Strained Back, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by Seattle on 2/9/2020 to a 2-year deal worth $1,370,009 per year...
Drove in 7 runs against Texas on 6/26/2020...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/25/2021, hitting .500 with 3 HR, 3 RBI...
Won World Series with Seattle in 2021...
